General.Name: Fieratex S.A.
General.Description: Fieratex S.A. operates as a textile company in Greece and internationally. The company provides light wear, inkjet or rotaty printed, water-resilient, and technical fabrics, as well as fabrics for women's wear. It also offers dyed and off-white fabrics and garments. Fieratex S.A. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Kilkis, Greece.

3.Name: Mr. Dimitrios I. Anezoulakis
3.Title: Exec. Member of the Board of Directors
